question: Which of the following railway zones has launched mobile app to help people navigate through Prayagraj city during Kumbh Mela?
explanation: The North Central Railway (NCR) has launched a \'Rail Kumbh Seva Mobile App\' to help people navigate through Prayagraj city during Kumbh Mela starting from January 15. The app will also provide information regarding all the \'Mela special\' trains that will be run during the period. Additionally, the app will provide a link to the user to buy both unreserved and reserved train tickets. Mr Malviya said, through this app, the users will not only get to know their current location, but will also be able to reach to all railway stations, the mela zone, major hotels, bus stations and other facilities within Prayagraj. A photo gallery, containing pictures of previous Kumbh Melas can also be accessed through the app.
